knimeNode.name: Z-Primes (PC x NC)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates z-prime coefficients for all combinations of a selection of negative and a selection of positive controls.

fullDescription.intro:
The output will be a new table that contains z-primes per plate and selecteed readout.
A more detailed introduction into Z'-primes and the use of robust statistics can be found in "High-Throughput screening in drug discovery, Hueser, 2006, Wiley".
fullDescription.option: Allows to select the readouts for which z-primes will be calcuated
The reference sample that is used to calculate the normalization coefficients

ports.outPort: A table containg a row for each plate with all z-primes as attributes.
